headline.main: AXIS ARMY ROUTED; Moscow Claims Victory Over 43 Divisions in Don-Volga Drives SIX-WEEK GAINS REVIEWED 175,000 Killed, 137,650 Captured, Enormous Booty Taken -- Germans Face New Trap AXIS ARMY ROUTED; SOVIET SEALS RING

lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, Friday, Jan. 1 -- The Russians declared officially for the first time today that twenty-two enemy divisions in the area of Stalingrad had been tightly encircled by the Red Army and announced that 312,650 German and satellite soldiers had been killed or captured thus far in the three great drives by which the iron ring was welded around the ruined Volga city in six weeks.
abstract: Gers rept USSR attacks repulsed, Velikiye Luki
